nodes.text: Senior Administrative Aide, also known as administrator, was a title held by the Umbaran Sly Moore, the Chief of Staff to Supreme Chancellor of the Galactic Republic Sheev Palpatine. Moore continued to use the title when she served the Republic's successor, the Galactic Empire. Under the Empire, Senior Administrative Aide Moore was able to direct Imperial Military forces on special order from Galactic Emperor Palpatine.
